TopicTitle: General Settings Cheats Not In Cheat Menu

Articles.Content:
I realized that there are many cheats that are not in the Alt + F8 menu that I think should be. I feel like these should be things in the general cheats menu to avoid the annoyance of having to go through the general settings to flip one switch for some of these things (that I definitely don't use as far as you know  ) 

This is the current general tab for the Alt + F8 cheats menu

 

and this is the general tab in the game settings

I think the things that should be added to the cheats menu should be:

Heat Enabled, Heat Scaling, Part Overheating, Infinite Propellant, Infinite Electricity, and Unbreakable Joints.

Also this "PHYSX JOINTS" section of settings is only available in the main menu and not inside an actual game, I'm not sure if this is on purpose or not but if it is available to be in the middle of a game I would also like it to be in the cheats menu just for a "funny" wobbly rocket mode for when I get frustrated at my flying skills and just want things to blow up and be dumb (obviously I'm glad wobbly rockets are fixed and thats good but they made sure you can turn it off for fun. Anyway long story short I'd like a wobbly rocket switch on my cheat menu just for fun idk.

 

Most of the emphasis of this post should be on these options though being in the cheat menu:

Heat Enabled, Heat Scaling, Part Overheating, Infinite Propellant, Infinite Electricity, and Unbreakable Joints.
